title: liuwei1969
author: liuwei1969
content: What happened:About a week ago i was awarded 99 free spins on 8bet.io. The condition on withdrawal was to wager the winning X40 which i have done . After requesting a withdrawal it was never processed. I emailed but no response. I contacted them on telegram but even after reading my message they don't respond. After doing some googling it seems the admin seem to reply on this forum. :Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1395644Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2579106Reference Link:Amount Scammed: 0.41 LTCPayment Method: LitecoinProof of Payment: https://imgur.com/a/tJvd0GLPM/Chat Logs: https://imgur.com/a/8HIljvoAdditional Notes: I have been with them since 2021. So it's not like i just signed up yesterday for free spins. I have withdrawn from them before without an issue but i don't know why suddenly i am being shut down

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: I believe they will respond into your case because they've taking care many accusations against them.It looks like ignoring message isn't nothing new for them since there's an user had a same experience like you.I will wait for the next few days to see if they respond this thread before paint their profile.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on October 07, 2023, 07:55:28 AMIt looks like ignoring message isn't nothing new for them since there's an user had a same experience like you.I will wait for the next few days to see if they respond this thread before paint their profile.If you look at the thread you linked to your post properly you’ll see that they did respond[1] to the thread and we got to know what really happened and the user that came up with the accusation thread was not truthful so there’s nothing for them to discuss further in that thread. Another things is that the representative account has been inactive for quite some time now so I don’t think they’ll be able to get any information about this thread and since he (the Op) already tried telegram he should also include the link to this thread and see if they’ll be any difference. [1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5433691.msg61572122#msg61572122

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on October 07, 2023, 09:04:39 AMAnother things is that the representative account has been inactive for quite some time now so I don’t think they’ll be able to get any information about this thread and since he (the Op) already tried telegram he should also include the link to this thread and see if they’ll be any difference. I saw this similar thread on the gambling board. If the accused account, which happens to be the casino representative, appears to be inactive, I think either the OP or any member can just send a PM here on the forum. If they happen to use a valid email, at least the mail notification could be able to drag back their attention here on the forum, as the PM will be detailed enough with the accusations thread included on it, as there have been many cases of that nature where the accused happens to be inactive, and PMs usually trigger their attention. This method can be used if their support fails to respond through Telegram.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I see you have linked the profiles associated with that site, have you sent them a PM notifying them of this thread? I seriously doubt that they are scamming anyone over 50$. It's possible, but any site trying to make it (even if exit scamming) is not going to screw someone over for less than $50. I'd say send a pm, see if you can get a response. If no response, bump this thread after a few days.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: liuwei1969 on October 07, 2023, 07:11:11 AMWhat happened:About a week ago i was awarded 99 free spins on 8bet.io. The condition on withdrawal was to wager the winning X40 which i have done . After requesting a withdrawal it was never processed. I emailed but no response. I contacted them on telegram but even after reading my message they don't respond. After doing some googling it seems the admin seem to reply on this forum.There are times that this platforms maybe going through alot on security challenges or making some site maintenance which may lead to having some difficult moments with their services, am not saying this to support them out but i think it's what is most common with other platforms as well, in this situation, try to be a little more patient with them, while you await a response from their contacts, also if you must choose a platform, make sure you're very satisfied with their reputation and trust before using them.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Quote from: liuwei1969 on October 07, 2023, 07:11:11 AMI emailed but no response. I contacted them on telegram but even after reading my message they don't respond. After doing some googling it seems the admin seem to reply on this forum. :What about contacting their support via live chat! It's the easiest and fastest way to submit a complaint or to get answers.You said you have been playing there for more than two years and you withdrew from them without any issues. Therefore, I think they deserve to be given the benefit of the doubt and to give them some more time before jumping to conclusions and calling them scammers.

comments.author: Incogsquito
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on October 07, 2023, 09:10:52 PMQuote from: liuwei1969 on October 07, 2023, 07:11:11 AMI emailed but no response. I contacted them on telegram but even after reading my message they don't respond. After doing some googling it seems the admin seem to reply on this forum. :What about contacting their support via live chat! It's the easiest and fastest way to submit a complaint or to get answers.You said you have been playing there for more than two years and you withdrew from them without any issues. Therefore, I think they deserve to be given the benefit of the doubt and to give them some more time before jumping to conclusions and calling them scammers.  So before I ever deposited. I was able to withdraw a 100. I was on the site a few years now. I've never tried try to withdraw until recently. I was able to withdraw a100 that I won from a promo. No problem, how's able to withdraw 100 coin?  That I won from a promotiown ocean. That I won from a promotion.And probably 3 weeks ago now so probably 5 weeks ago now I deposited. 100 doge tried to withdraw 1200 after I made several 6-900 doge depos that day and I never received it. I hunk support got sick of me asking about it on every channel finally I got a reply back said its probably a risk management thing and mind you support was one super responsive I had a very good relationship ship with 8b3t email  team now just ghosted besides the 1 shitty.reply in 5 weeks

comments.author: liuwei1969
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on October 07, 2023, 09:10:52 PMQuote from: liuwei1969 on October 07, 2023, 07:11:11 AMI emailed but no response. I contacted them on telegram but even after reading my message they don't respond. After doing some googling it seems the admin seem to reply on this forum. :What about contacting their support via live chat! It's the easiest and fastest way to submit a complaint or to get answers.You said you have been playing there for more than two years and you withdrew from them without any issues. Therefore, I think they deserve to be given the benefit of the doubt and to give them some more time before jumping to conclusions and calling them scammers. Their live chat button on the website is just for the show. I have never seen them replying there EVER. And yes, they have processed my withdrawals before that's why i waited a week to see may be they will eventually respond but they never did. It's been 9 days so far.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.created_time: October 08, 2023, 03:17:20 AMLast edit: October 08, 2023, 08:49:34 AM by yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: liuwei1969 on October 07, 2023, 07:11:11 AMAdditional Notes: I have been with them since 2021. So it's not like i just signed up yesterday for free spins. I have withdrawn from them before without an issue but i don't know why suddenly i am being shut downIf you say that you have been with them since 2021 and have not had any problems during this long period and you have withdrawn before without problems, then there must be a problem or an acceptable excuse this time.If they have been working well during all that period, they must have gained a good reputation, so it does not make sense for them to suddenly turn into a scam. You have to wait a little while and keep trying to contact them. There may be a problem with your account or a misunderstanding, or there may be other reasons preventing them from contacting you or Reply right now.

comments.author: liuwei1969
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on October 08, 2023, 03:17:20 AMQuote from: liuwei1969 on October 07, 2023, 07:11:11 AMAdditional Notes: I have been with them since 2021. So it's not like i just signed up yesterday for free spins. I have withdrawn from them before without an issue but i don't know why suddenly i am being shut downIf you say that you have been with them since 2021 and have not had any problems during this long period and you have withdrawn before without problems, then there must be a problem or an acceptable excuse this time.If they have been working well during all that period, they must have gained a good reputation, so it does not make sense for them to suddenly turn into a scam. You have to wait a little while and keep trying to contact them. There may be a problem with your account or a misunderstanding, or there may be other reasons preventing them from contacting them. Reply right now.You are correct since i have withdrawn from them before i didn't think they were gonna scam me. But today is Day 10 since i first contacted them. It's a bit unusual to keep ignoring for ten days. No?

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: liuwei1969 on October 07, 2023, 07:11:11 AMAdditional Notes: I have been with them since 2021. So it's not like i just signed up yesterday for free spins. I have withdrawn from them before without an issue but i don't know why suddenly i am being shut downSomeone like me won't easily rush to raise a scam accusations against them being that you have been using them for long and also, knowing too well that they have a representative why not just send them pm here in this forum first maybe after much longer then you can raise an alarm if you see their response weren't good to you before creating this topic. I don't think this is necessary as I know this site has been here for long and they are running sig campaign, besides it's very hard for a casino or gambling site that is running a campaign here to compromise though not that such can't happen but you should at least first reach out to them here or their campaign manager to assist you to contact them.

comments.author: liuwei1969
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on October 09, 2023, 04:55:00 PMQuote from: liuwei1969 on October 07, 2023, 07:11:11 AMAdditional Notes: I have been with them since 2021. So it's not like i just signed up yesterday for free spins. I have withdrawn from them before without an issue but i don't know why suddenly i am being shut downSomeone like me won't easily rush to raise a scam accusations against them being that you have been using them for long and also, knowing too well that they have a representative why not just send them pm here in this forum first maybe after much longer then you can raise an alarm if you see their response weren't good to you before creating this topic. I don't think this is necessary as I know this site has been here for long and they are running sig campaign, besides it's very hard for a casino or gambling site that is running a campaign here to compromise though not that such can't happen but you should at least first reach out to them here or their campaign manager to assist you to contact them.I have already sent a message to one of their account called "8bet" two days ago. No reply. Their other account "8betnews" can't receive messages from newbie.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Quote from: liuwei1969 on October 10, 2023, 11:28:52 PMI have already sent a message to one of their account called "8bet" two days ago. No reply. Their other account "8betnews" can't receive messages from newbie.8Bet is supposed to be their personal representative on this forum but his last post was on the 10th of January and he didn't login here for more than 3 months. If he didn't log in he can't read your pm.8betnews is most likely a bot used to post updates and notifications about promotions and contests. He doesn't even reply to members' comments in their official thread. Don't waste your time trying to message him.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: liuwei1969 on October 10, 2023, 11:28:52 PMI have already sent a message to one of their account called "8bet" two days ago. No reply. Their other account "8betnews" can't receive messages from newbie.One week has been passed since you created this thread. Is there any update about your issue? 8bet marketing manager (8betnews) is active in the forum, but he is ignoring your issue. I had also sent an email to their email support 3 days ago and asked the 8bet team to clarify your issue here. Seems like they are busy and ignoring the emails.

comments.author: 8Bet
comments.body: Clear case of multiple duplicate accounts abusing the free promos.They used "clever" techniques to avoid usual detection, but made several mistakes and got caught by out systems. We have reviewed the case and confirm abuse.User has now been blocked from the site.Note that this account is overall in profit on 8bet.io so we do not see a need for any further refund or compensation. Case closed.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on October 15, 2023, 01:35:31 PM8bet marketing manager (8betnews) is active in the forum, but he is ignoring your issue.If you check 8betnews's posts you will notice that he never interact with other members or answer their questions. He only share bonuses codes or post notifications about new contests. This is why I said it's mist likely a bot. QuoteI had also sent an email to their email support 3 days ago and asked the 8bet team to clarify your issue here. Seems like they are busy and ignoring the emails.To be honest, being busy is not an excuse especially that more than a week has passed without a single reply. The only thing their customer service should be busy with is addressing their customer's concerns.Quote from: 8Bet on October 15, 2023, 09:37:47 PMClear case of multiple duplicate accounts abusing the free promos.Thank you for the clarification.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: 8Bet on October 15, 2023, 09:37:47 PM~snip~Thank you for taking your time to clarify the situation here.Quote from: liuwei1969 on October 16, 2023, 04:50:54 AMIf anyone seem to care just a small update on my case is that they have blocked me on Telegram.You shouldn't have any complaints against them as you have abused their free bonuses. Moreover, you are in profit there. I trust the statement of 8Bet representative as we have rarely seen scam accusations against them.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: liuwei1969 on October 16, 2023, 04:50:54 AMIf anyone seem to care just a small update on my case is that they have blocked me on Telegram.Maybe because you are spamming their chat about your scam accusation while you are the one who’s abusing their promo?Clearly you don’t read the last reply of 8bet here on your thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5469506.msg63000776#msg63000776. The problem is not about completing the wagering requirements but rather your abused of promotion using multiple account.
